content.label: Love the game however since updating to the director’s cut, the app crashes after the final boss battle and I don’t get to see the final score. Additionally, the final score doesn’t always give details and only provides points based on difficulty level and won’t let you shoot the zombie developers at the end. Still love playing though.
Please make a second one, this ones amazing
Needs new update better controls for the iPhone X maybe a big overhaul

title.label: one of the best games i've ever played

content.label: i cant even remember how long i've been playing this game. i played it YEARS ago on the computer and just rediscovered on the phone and its so much fun, the perfect amount of difficult, immersive, and fun. love it
Charming at times, but the shooting controls are lousy. Essentially you pull towards the character to shoot, which works badly at best, and you are easily overrun. Not fun to play.
If this game of offered for free, get it. Other then that though, there is a lot missing for a game that one pays for.
Bought all the in app purchases and now cannot re-download. Is there a fix coming or doesn't the designer care?
Just purchased but cannot download?
Tried to re-install this app but it wouldn't let me. I'll give this four stars because i really liked this game the last time i played it.
I’ve finished the campaign like 10 times, trying to get all characters, cars, tombstones and achievements to 100% the game. It is really fun and I recommend it.

title.label: One of the best mobile games

content.label: Amazing game love the style and sound effects. Also the dlc makes the game 10 times better then it already was.

title.label: A game I have never forgotten

content.label: This game is so well created, I’ve been playing it since it came out and I still can’t get enough of it. Great for road trips.
I LOVE THIS S**T wish MWWMH would release more retro titles so they could be grouped into one package deal, ain’t that a good idea mwwmh? AINT IT!!!???
Great game

This game is more expensive than some people are accustomed to. That’s fine, but for perspective, I shelled out three dollars for “Organ Trail” when I was nine years old. I’m now fifteen, and I still re-download it every few months and play through a trip with four of my close friends, just for the sheer joy of it. Bottom line: it pays for itself. You’re gonna be using a long time. That’s why it’s worth the three bucks, and why I’m beside myself with excitement after just having bought the expansions.
My favorite mobile game and one that is unlike any other. A must-have on anybody’s phone.

This game is awesome, it’s the type of game that I really like. But I think that it needs more, the organ trail isn’t very fresh anymore, I see the same senarios over and over after a while. I think it’s great, but it could be better once it’s updated and adds more stuff

This game is Great! The music brings you on a journey as well as traveling surviving and picking your ways though life to survive as well this game brings many emotion... I bought death road to Canada, 6.99 now it's 10.99... this game beats it I love this game, not a bad price!

I bought this game a few months ago just to have some games to play while I conserve data, and the organ trail has been a great way for me to pass time at work. I do wish people would stop complaining about the DLC price though. I mean come on! It's cheap.

The game could be incredibly fun, but the controls are absolutely awful. Every encounter is made difficult/impossible only by the controls, making the game only frustrating, not fun. If the controls were actually intuitive then this would be an amazing game.

This game is -in a word- frustrating. I played it the whole way through, made it to the end screen, and on "you enter safe haven" the game freezes. I reloaded and played the final cutscene 10 times, but it will not let me continue, making it impossible to unlock achievements and vehicles. Unbelievably aggravating, especially because the campaign mode was quite fun.
Amazing game and it's very intriguing
I was looking for Oregan Trail and downloaded by mistake.  I tried to play it, but, really... it gives retro games a bad name.
I love the art design and gameplay mechanics
It's a fun game but If you buy the expansion packs you have to unlock the the stuff and it's really hard and takes a long time, I still haven't unlocked a new car or a character and it's been weeks.

title.label: I don't take the time to write reviews, but this game deserves it

content.label: This game is amazing. Great job. Keep making DLC. I will personally promote this game to my friends. Whether they played the Oregon trail or not. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
I love this game so much. But I was wondering, will there be any new updates?
Great idea - but played through to the safe haven twice, then it locked up before entering both times. What's the point?
This game is so much fun

I might only have played this game for 2 days , but during that time it was one of the best mobile games I every played and is worth the price. It might be a tiny review but I don't want to spoil it for you. Epically all the random a counters you can get with your groups. Honestly I give this 5 stars because it the best mobile game on my phone
Is this a joke!? Not Oregon trail I want my money back
This game is amazing, the simplicity of it is what makes this game so great. The only thing that I wish was that you can find a cure for one of your infected members
I just love the game... 'Nuff said...
This is a awesome game only played for 30 minutes so far but love it. Only 4 because the moving controls are difficult

I tend to hate horror and zombie games on account of all the violence and gore and severe lack of story. Organ trail is everything but that! Packed to the brim with dialogue, tips and trivia, morality choices and adventure, the simplistic graphics are both charming and friendly to those on the squeamish side. It's wickedly funny and clever, and definitely stands out among other zombie survival games. Both true to the original game and unique in its own right, Organ Trail is well worth 5/5 stars.
Reminds me of my youth, but zombified and far more fun.
This game is amazing! I have it on PS Vita, PS4, Mac and now iPhone. EXTREMELY addicting. Great throw back to Oregon Trail with lots of nerd references thrown in!
Much like the game with the similar name from the 80s, it's a blast
This is so awesome thanks😺!!

I love this game but I have firetrap and was hoping if you'd get the same one if you have the game to play with your friends and family and friends and family game and your phone is the best one game ever made you think you are cool but I don't like that you are the one to get your phone and family and friends and I don't have friends or family or other stuff so just shut upppp!!!!

I've always wanted a good Oregon Trail remake or spinoff and this delivers! With challenging gameplay and tough as nails story, if you looking for a very realistic and challenging look at the zombie apocolipse this is the game for you.
Awesome game! If you love The Oregon Trail then this is the game for you. My only problem is that every time I finish an endless mode it doesn't give me my score modifiers. Please fix
All u do is avoid zombies this game is crap...I'm very disappointed in u guys........
Worst 3 bucks ive spent
This game is a ton of fun. Bought it on Steam and here in the App Store. Beat it on both.

title.label: So good and yet so disappointing

content.label: I just had a great experience playing this game and safeguarding my entire team to safe haven. I even picked up a baby along the way and fed it to the end. After getting all the gas and starting the generator I was greeted to a new final boss I hadn't known about. I defeated the boss without a scratch and was stuck at a "you got into safe haven, press anywhere to continue" screen. The game would not continue. In my anger and frustration the squid was able to hit me and I got to a screen of my crippled player crawling only to be eaten by a zombie. The game wasted no time deleting my save leaving me with a wide jaw and a broken heart. Fix this. Seriously. That's just disrespectful to your players to leave something like this in.
Boring uninspired gameplay. Controls are awful. Almost impossible to for the game to recognize a shot vs a command to walk. Not worth the buy
My favorite game and best app ever! Extremely unique and I just love it 👾

The expansions are kinda redundant. Adding fishing, different paths, it should be in the default game. But totally worth $3.00, it's addictive and fun, but having multiple paths (defaultly) would add to the replayablity and make the game more worthwhile. The game deserves more love, but the expansions are Linda stupid for the most part. 4 1/5 stars
因为

This is one of my favorite games ever. No matter how many times I play it, it never fails to keep me content. The soundtrack is absolutely stellar, and it has to be some of the best 8-Bit music I've ever heard. Scratch that, some of the best music I've ever heard period. The game's concept makes me all too happy, the characters are great, the trip, everything. I love it so much. Thank you for creating this masterpiece.
